keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
unmapAll
map j scrollDown
map k scrollUp
map h scrollLeft
map l scrollRight
map gg scrollToTop
map G scrollToBottom
map r reload
map yy copyCurrentUrl
map yu openCopiedUrlInCurrentTab
map yt openCopiedUrlInNewTab
map uk goUp
map ur goToRoot
map gd scrollPageDown
map gu scrollPageUp
map gi focusInput
map f LinkHints.activateMode
map df LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
map gf LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab
map yf LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl
map if LinkHints.activateModeToOpenIncognito
map < goPrevious
map > goNext
map cm Marks.activateCreateMode
map gm Marks.activateGotoMode
map bt Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab
map b Vomnibar.activateBookmarks
map ue Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
map ut Vomnibar.activateEditUrlInNewTab
map s Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map / enterFindMode
map n performFind
map N performBackwardsFind
map t createTab
map dt duplicateTab
map p visitPreviousTab
map 1 firstTab
map 9 lastTab
map m toggleMuteTab
map x removeTab
map X restoreTab
map w moveTabToNewWindow
map zx closeTabsOnLeft
map vx closeTabsOnRight
map ox closeOtherTabs
map [ moveTabLeft
map ] moveTabRight
map ? showHelp
